thread.title: Police find body of murdered KZN teen
thread.title_full: Police find body of murdered KZN teen | News24

author: news24.com
title: Police find body of murdered KZN teen
text:
Durban - Police officers searching for a missing teenager made a grim discovery on Friday when her decomposed body was found stuffed into the housing of a long-drop toilet.
The 14-year-old girl had been reported missing last week.
Police search and rescue unit dog handlers, supported by a police helicopter, searched KwaNcolosi near Inanda Dam.
They responded to community reports about a suspicious smell near the toilet and, on closer inspection, found the body.
